attributes.action: Reduce Benefits to some people living in Supported Living. Come On! £220 a week for doing nothing is a waste!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I work in Mental Health Care (I earn approx £220 a week) with adults who need Support to live independently. The majority of the clients i work with claim over £200 in DLA, Income Support etc. Many have little or no financial commitments and this Money is often spent on luxury items. Many of my clients have thousands of pounds in the bank and still get high rates of Benefits. Being offered such a large weekly allowance gives my clients no or little motivation to improve there personal situation, find a job or look to the future.
